Indestructible
[i]Slayer of Nemesis[/i] – When Seiros, Revered Saint enters, exile target creature with mana value 6 or greater.
[i]Daughter of Creation[/i] – When Seiros enters, create Sword of Seiros, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with indestructible, “Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.” and equip Demigod {3}.
[i]The Immaculate One[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you have four or more Noble cards in your graveyard, transform Seiros.
